resources.string: No game categories found!\nClick the + to add a new game category.
No games found!\nClick the + to add a new game.
Must enter a number greater than 0

Welcome to the Help Centre!
Win2Gether is designed to generate the co-operative achievement ranks of game categories you've saved, as well as track the history and results of your played games.

Game Category:
Displays the different game categories you've entered into the system. Click the + to add a new game category.

Game Manager:
Displays the game history of one game category and the results of each game. Click on the + to add a new game. Click on an individual played game to edit/delete the game. Click on the pencil icon to edit the game configuration. Click on ACHIEVEMENTS and enter valid number of players to view possible achievements.

Achievements:
Displays the different possible achievements of one game category based on the number of players you've entered. Images from: openmoji.org and pngtree.com
